rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0001
rows.name:
I thank you for this defeat.
Our encounter has been most...edifying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0002
rows.name: North of here lies a shadowy land of rock and fire.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0003
rows.name: Jagged black stone, lit only by scars of boiling magma...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0004
rows.name: There you will find the Ganglion stronghold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0005
rows.name: May the tides of war lift your fortunes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0006
rows.name: Bad guy was...not so bad, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0007
rows.name: Yeah.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0008
rows.name:
He said they're mercenaries—
maybe we could convince them to fight for us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0009
rows.name: Great idea, Linly! Tatsu looove kitties![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0010
rows.name: I wouldn't call them kitties to their face, small fry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0011
rows.name:
They'd slice you up, brine the wedges,
add a nice butter-cream sauce, then—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0012
rows.name: Linly talking WAY too many details![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0013
rows.name: Oh...hah, sorry. Was I saying that out loud?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0014
rows.name: Linly is NOT funny.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0015
rows.name: Hey, good news:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0016
rows.name:
Lao was just admitted to the maintenance center.
Looks like he's gonna make it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0017
rows.name: Really? Thank God they got to him in time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0018
rows.name: Let's hurry back and check in on him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0019
rows.name: Right...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0020
rows.name: Elma? ...What is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0021
rows.name: Nothing, sorry—just a little worried about Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09080100_MSG0022
rows.name: Let's get back to New LA.[ST:wait ]
